Banners.Title: Amortage
Banners.Description: Amortage marks a powerful step in Jisoo’s solo career, showcasing her emotional depth and vocal maturity. With four distinct tracks, the album paints a vivid picture of love—from its tremors to its tender embraces.

Banners.Title: Earthquake
Banners.Description: Opening the album with a bang, “Earthquake” captures the electric rush of falling in love. Jisoo’s strong vocals ride the intense beat, making it an unforgettable intro track.

Banners.Title: Hugs & Kisses
Banners.Description: Closing the album on a warm note, “Hugs & Kisses” is a sweet and soothing track. Its cozy melody and heartfelt lyrics wrap listeners in a feeling of comfort and closure.

Banners.Title: Your Love
Banners.Description: “Your Love” wraps you in a dreamy, romantic soundscape. With light synths and Jisoo’s gentle voice, it feels like floating through a late-night drive under city lights. It’s the kind of song that stays in your head — and your heart.

Banners.Title: Tears
Banners.Description: A haunting ballad, “Tears” delves into the pain of love lost. Jisoo delivers each lyric with raw emotion, touching the listener with her soft yet sorrowful tone.

Banners.Title: Press Play
Banners.Description: From the first note to the last whisper, Amortage isn’t just an album — it’s a feeling. It’s the type of record you keep coming back to when words aren’t enough.
